name: SUN-LANCER
description:
Sun-lancer is a auto shoot-em' up game where your ship can absorb solar radiation to fuel itself and alter its weapons. Though each type of solar radiation has benefits, most have some kind of drawback.

CONTROLS - all reachable with only 1 hand.

WASD to move the ship around the screen.

Spacebar will speed up the camera scroll.

Shift - activate shield, shield can protect you from absorbing certain radiation and prevent damage from some sources.

HOW TO PLAY - collect the solar radiation clouds to fuel the ship. Green radiation will increase how fast you shoot and what type of weapon is being fired. Red radiation will damage the ship but will also empower your weapons to deal more damage.  Purple radiation will replenish your shield energy but reduce the weapons damage. Blue radiation will reduce the fire rate of the ship but will repair damage done to the ship. Also be aware of how much contamination the pilot and co-pilot can absorb, too much and they will cease to live.

We made this game using Construct 3, Aseprite, SFXR, Presonus Studio One.

I made this game with  https://bearscythestudios.itch.io/ you can find more about the credits in the game.
